content: Those who don’t read will, when they are 70, have led only one life: their own! Those who read will have lived 5,000 years: they were there when Cain killed Abel, when Renzo married Lucia and when Leopardi admired the infinite…because reading is immortality backwards.
translations: ita:Chi non legge, a 70 anni avrà vissuto una sola vita﹕ la propria! Chi legge avrá vissuto 5000 anni﹕ c'era quando Caino uc
